Ōtara baby death: Hefty sentence for father who beat baby to death, but identity still kept secret https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/otara-baby-death-hefty-sentence-for-father-who-beat-baby-to-death-but-identity-still-kept-secret/ YBPQOSG3HZCOJD6WYECYXF44VA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/otara-baby-death-hefty-sentence-for-father-who-beat-baby-to-death-but-identity-still-kept-secret/ YBPQOSG3HZCOJD6WYECYXF44VA/ Craig KapitanThe infant victim and the man who killed her still cannot be named by court order. Tue, 30 Apr 2024 00:18:59 +0000 A man with ongoing name suppression has been handed a life sentence with a minimum term of imprisonment of 17 years for the May 2022 murder of his baby daughter. Her name also cannot be revealed. Photo / NZME
